headline: Uber Faces FTC Consumer Protection Probe Over Subscriptions
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The US Federal Trade Commission is looking into whether Uber Technologies Inc. violated consumer protection laws with its flagship subscription service. headline: FTC probes Uber over subscription service practices, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is investigating Uber Technologies Inc (NYSE:UBER) over allegations that it enrolled customers into its Uber One subscription service without consent and made it challenging for them to cancel, according to a Bloomberg report.

headline: Move Over, Uber. Billionaire David Tepper Just Raised Appaloosa's Stake in This Other Ride-Hailing Stock By 98%.
summary: David Tepper's Appaloosa Management continues piling into Lyft as the company stages a comeback for the ages.

headline: Invesco Convertible Securities Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: Convertibles (as measured by the ICE BofA US Convertible Index) returned 5.28% for the third quarter, compared to the S&P 500 Index, which returned 5.89%.
